THWildcard.Title: Click to display image options. Right click to randomize.
THWildcard.DefaultDescription: When dropping a token in canvas with wildcard selected, if this field is filled this image will be selected instead of randomizing it.
THWildcard.DisplaySettingHint: Disable to display wildcard options as a list of their filenames in the HUD. Default enabled.
THWildcard.OpacitySettingHint: Configure the opacity of the token previews in the HUD before hovering on them. Default 50%.
THWildcard.AnimateSettingHint: If enabled, token size changes are animated. Default enabled.
THWildcard.parseSettingHint: If enabled, wildcard image file names are parsed for scale/size/width settings. Default enabled.
THWildcard.randomizeSettingHint: If enabled, right clicking the Wildcard token HUD button will select a random image. Default enabled.
THWildcard.shareSettingHint: If enabled, right clicking an image in the wildcard image selection will open that image in a popup for sharing. Default enabled.
